Action.Name: DlgRadioButton.GetProperties
Action.Description: Gets the properties of a radio button control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the radio button control whose properties you want.

Action.Name: DlgRadioButton.SetProperties
Action.Description: Sets the properties of a radio button control on the current screen.

Arg.Name: ControlID
Arg.Description: The numeric ID of the radio button control whose properties you want to set.

Arg.Name: Properties
Arg.Description: A table containing the radio button control properties, indexed by "Checked", "Enabled", "Text" and "Visible".
